faq_items.question: What are your opening hours?
faq_items.answer: We are open from 7 AM to 10 PM daily

faq_items.question: Do you have wifi?
faq_items.answer: Yes, we provide free wifi for all customers

faq_items.question: Can I bring my dog?
faq_items.answer: We allow well-behaved dogs in our outdoor seating area

faq_items.question: Do you accept reservations?
faq_items.answer: Yes, you can make reservations by calling us or through our website
